text:
used it on a site for a company i used to work for:
<http://www.teachertailored.com>
Ever since then, i use that as my go to. (Note: This was built years ago so its def not the _best_ work i've done lol)
With their Cornerstone page builder you can design/build a full site in a couple of days.
I've seen that one before reg
Yeah, I've only used a couple of different themes on wordpress and once I hit x-theme I've never considered using another theme.
Only issue I ran into w/ BeTheme was that it hadn't thoroughly been tested on mobile. Even their demos break in some cases. And support isn't great.
Yea some of the mobile stuff was glitchy. I think they made some good forward progress on that. Support is def a mess. Their "Support Forum" is terrible.

I started to toy with WPMUDev's Upfront Theme Builder. Their starter themes aren't something I'd ever use, but if you've got the time to design inbrowser, it's actually quite nice and easy to use. Just doesn't have all the bells and whistles a lot of these other themes have.
